data.author: tisFerry

changelog.release_notes:
New layout.

Option to switch on/off seconds in date field after shaking wrist.

New layout.
All European countries are now available.

data.description:
This watchface is for Pebblers in Europe only.
(Pebblers in the USA and Canada, please check out USA DualTime).

Besides the local time, date and weather (temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit), this watchface also shows the time in your home country as a dual time when you travel to a different timezone. And no hassle, this watchface auto adjusts to summer and wintertime. A must-have for the holidays. Never call home at an awkward moment again!

Shake your wrist to show seconds in stead of the date (see settings). Futhermore an attention signal and icon, when bluetooth connection with your phone is lost.

The background colour of the local time indicates the battery level. Up to and above 30% green, up to 20% orange and less than 20% red.

After downloading this watchface, go to settings (in the Pebble app on your phone) to set your home country and your temperature preference (Celsius or Fahrenheit).

If you like it, heart it ;-)

latest_release.release_notes:

data.title: EU DualTime
